thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: AO

author: AO
title: AO
text: Had no trouble cancelling an order that hadn't been shipped yet and the refund was back in my account within a day or two. I ordered a second pair and it took some time to get a status on shipping. But, I emailed them to ask about the status and to see if the order could be rushed, and they immediately sprung into action. I ordered frames only and they were exactly what I wanted. Good quality. Very happy with Smart Buy.
